title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
subTitle: Discount is now available on our 12 month plan, contact us now!

starterKit.name: Online Starter Kit
starterKit.description: Perfect for getting started: Ideal for businesses taking their first step online or those needing a quick refresh.
features: Reliable hosting: Your website will be hosted on our secure servers, ensuring it's always up and running.
Social media boost: We'll help you create engaging social media profiles and get started with 4 eye-catching posts per month.
Basic search engine optimization (SEO): We'll make sure your website is visible on Google.
Friendly live support: We're here to answer your questions and help you get started.
New website creation (add-on): Don't have a website yet? We can build one for you! (Contact us for a custom quote.)

professionalToolbox.name: Growth & Marketing Package
professionalToolbox.description: Everything you need to grow: Take your online presence to the next level and attract more customers.
features: All the features of the Online Starter Kit, plus:
Social media management: We'll manage your Facebook and Instagram presence, creating and sharing 12 posts per month to engage your audience.
Advanced SEO: We'll optimize your website to rank higher in search results and attract more organic traffic.
Priority live support (24/7): Get faster responses and expert help whenever you need it.
20% off on our annual subscription: Take advantage of our annual subscription.

enterprise.name: Custom Web Solutions
enterprise.description: For businesses with big plans: Tailored solutions for complex needs and ambitious goals.
features: All the features of the Growth & Marketing Package, plus:
Social media management: We'll manage your social media presence, creating and sharing 20 high-quality posts per month.
API integrations: Connect your website with other software and tools to streamline your business processes.
Marketing consulting: Get expert advice and guidance on how to grow your business.
E-commerce integration: Sell your products or services online with a fully integrated online store.
